docs.text:
In order to get a docker image of Oracle-xe I did the following steps.
docker pull alexeiled/docker-oracle-xe-11g
docker run -d -p 49160:22 -p 49161:1521 -p 49162:8080 alexeiled/docker-oracle-xe-11g


Connection Details


hostname: localhost
port: 1521
sid: xe
username: system
password: oracle
==============================================================


In order to connect from a client tool I used QueryLight which also worked seemlessly.


Reference:
http://tuhrig.de/3-ways-of-installing-oracle-xe-11g-on-ubuntu/
